title: Bad Blood
description: In this Dateline classic, Twin sisters Jasmiyah and Tasmiyah Whitehead discover their mother Nikki savagely murdered in their home. Keith Morrison reports. Originally aired on NBC on August 1, 2014.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
